name: Melbourne Highlights Discovery (Sightseeing, Shopping, Activities, Cuisine Combined Themes)
description: For any upcoming holidays and events, there will never be too late to spend precious time with family, friends, or your own travel experiences to discover Melbourne, to visit highlights and unique locations of this beautiful city gets to offer. This exclusive special tour will bring you closer to the beauty and diversity of Melbourne, to discover charming locations, exciting activities, and of course, interesting and award-winning cuisine from local area (both urban and rural region), so what are you waiting for? Let this adventure begin!!!
